member.name: T:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extension methods to create labels, escaped strings, etc. in a specified target language.

member.name: P:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.Target
member.summary: Sets the code generation target type. This ensures that labels, etc have the correct prefixes and formatting style for the target language. The default is 'CS' to generate for C#.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.Label(System.Object)
member.summary: Generate a label for the currently specified code generation target. The default is to generate for C#.
member.returns: Appropriately escaped label for current target language.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.CS(System.Object)
member.summary:
Convert an arbitrary string to a label suitable for use in C# code avoiding collisions with reserved words and labels reserved to implementation code.
All spaces are converted to underscores. Labels that begin with a number or a leading underscore or are a reserved word are prefixed by an underscore.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.If(System.String)
member.summary: Return the string value if a condition is met, otherwise return an empty string.
member.param: The string to return if Value is true.
member.returns: The string Text if Value is true, otherwise a null string.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.If(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Return the string value if a condition is met, otherwise return an empty string.
member.param: The string to return if Value is true.
member.returns: The string Text if Value is true, otherwise a null string.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.If(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the first string value if a condition is met, otherwise return the second
member.param: The string to return if Value is true.
The string to return if Value is false.
member.returns: The string Text if Value is true, otherwise a null string.

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.TBS(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: To Be Specified stub. Writes out the value to the console an returns the string.
member.param: If true, wrap value in bold style tags

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.ValueOrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Returns if not null, otherwise, the string "null"

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.ExtensionMethods.NotNullTagged(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an empty string if is null, otherwise the string || .
member.param: Optional tag to prefix a non null value.

member.name: T:Goedel.Registry.Separator
member.summary: The separator class prints as one value the first time ToString() is called and a different value thereafter.

member.name: P:Goedel.Registry.Separator.First
member.summary: Value to return the first time ToString() is called

member.name: P:Goedel.Registry.Separator.Next
member.summary: Value to return after the first time ToString() is called

member.name: P:Goedel.Registry.Separator.IsFirst
member.summary: Is this the first time ToString was called?

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.Separator.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: String to return on the first call to ToString()
String to return after the first call to ToString()

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.Separator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a separactor class that returns an empty string the first time ToString is called.
member.param: String to return after the first call to ToString()

member.name: M:Goedel.Registry.Separator.ToString
member.summary: Return the value First if this is the first time the method is called or Next otherwise.
